Detailed Description

Base Class for OnOffTools.

The OnOffTool class is a generic base class for all OnOffTool classes. It contains the functionality of an On/Off switch and also to find the state of the OnOffTool. The implementation for a specific OnOffTool is done in a derived class. For example, the DefaultOnOffTool class.

Example Program:

bool isOn ( ) [pure virtual]
 

Determines if the OnOffTool is on.

Returns:
true: If the OnOffTool is on.
false: If the OnOffTool is off.
